segments.text: OK , guys . Here's the plan . Get the ball to the goal , and keep it away from Rich and Taylor !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They played ball at school . Here we go . Yi-jun , go out for a pass !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm ready ! Whoa , what a hard throw ! I can't get that !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Catch it , Yi-jun ! Run to the ball ! Uh-oh ! Slow down , you're going to hit ...
segments.speaker: S1
